title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description: Steps to reproduce:1. Export multiple files with the same name but under different directories to a zip file.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name but under different directories to a zip file, the operation fails.
EB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories.
SR:
1. Open the project containing files with the same name but under different directories.
2. Select and export these files to a zip file.
3. Observe that the operation fails and the zip file does not contain all the selected files.
